title: Autumnal Cozy w/ Esther Ellmore
description:
This week, there’s a mouse in the house and it's Jessica hiding in June’s closet! The girls discuss all things autumnal coziness and why having a professional support network is so necessary in everyone's lives. Then, the gals are joined by Interior Designer Esther Ellmore who gives us hot tips on how to come into your space differently, and how to let your space evolve with you, even if that’s just as simple as introducing a fresh pop of color. Deep Divers remember, your home can be functional AND pretty.

For more design inspiration follow Esther Ellmore on instagram @ellmoredesign or her website ellmoredesign.com 

Check out all our HOT merch at https://kinshipgoods.com/collections/deep-dive

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod                      

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram                        

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram                      

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com                       

Contact us at thedeepdive@earwolf.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
